author: nothappygooutside
comment: as long as the timing doesn't clash, go ahead. the semester schedule usually only comes out in march or april, so ensure those two days you're required to come to work, you have no classes. fyi, in y1, you usually only have one day of the week with no classes, or you have none at all. i'm friends with some a&f students, and in y1 none of them had free days on their schedule. so to play it safe, you might want to shorten your internship period.
